A

AdamOptimizer - Class in edu.bu.cp.nn.optimizers
An Optimizer which updates parameters according to the vanilla optimization step: theta_i = theta_i - lr * theta.grad If enabled, this Optimizer will clip gradients to be within a specified range (to encourage numerical stability).

Shape - Class in edu.bu.cp.linalg
A class to contain the pair (numRows, numCols) for a 2d matrix object (which can also be vectors) In the future I might expand this to allow for arbitrary dimensional matrices, but 2d for now

testSaveAndLoad() - Static method in class edu.bu.cp.nn.test.GradTest
public static void trainSingleConv2dLayerWithGradCheck() throws Exception, IndexOutOfBoundsException { int imgHeight = 5; int imgWidth = 4; int kernelSize = 3; int numKernels = 4; Matrix X = Matrix.randn(imgHeight, imgWidth); Matrix Y_gt = Matrix.randn(1, 1); int numEpochs = 10; double lr = 1e-9; Sequential m = new Sequential(); m.add(new Conv2dMaxPool(numKernels, new Shape(kernelSize, kernelSize))); m.add(new ReLU()); m.add(new Flatten()); m.add(new Dense(2, 1)); LossFunction lf = new MeanSquaredError(); Optimizer optim = new SGDOptimizer(m.getParameters(), lr); for(int epochIdx = 0; epochIdx < numEpochs; ++epochIdx) { optim.reset(); Matrix Y_hat = m.forward(X); double err = lf.forward(Y_hat, Y_gt).item(); System.out.println(err); m.backwards(X, lf.backwards(Y_hat, Y_gt)); GradTest.checkGrads(m, lf, X, Y_gt, GradTest.EPSILON, GradTest.DELTA); optim.step(); } }
